filmography.title: The Song of Bernadette
filmography.role_description: The cynical imperial prosecutor who tries to discredit Bernadette's visions but is ultimately shaken by his own illness.
filmography.plot: In 1858 France, a peasant girl's vision of a 'beautiful lady' brings controversy and eventually healing to her town.

filmography.title: Laura
filmography.role_description: A suave but parasitic Southern playboy who is the fiancé of the murder victim in this noir masterpiece.
filmography.plot: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

filmography.title: Leave Her to Heaven
filmography.role_description: A jilted politician who becomes the relentless prosecutor in the trial of his former fiancée's sister.
filmography.plot: A writer falls in love with a young socialite, only to discover that her obsessive love for him is deadly.

filmography.title: Dragonwyck
filmography.role_description: An aristocratic patroon who rules his estate with an iron fist and harbors a dark secret about his wife's death.
filmography.plot: A simple country girl marries a wealthy distant cousin and moves into his gloomy mansion, where she discovers his madness.

filmography.title: The Three Musketeers
filmography.role_description: The scheming Prime Minister of France who manipulates the King and plots against the Musketeers.
filmography.plot: D'Artagnan and his three musketeer friends fight to protect the King of France against the scheming Cardinal Richelieu.

filmography.title: The Baron of Arizona
filmography.role_description: A brilliant con man who spends years forging documents to claim ownership of the entire Arizona territory.
filmography.plot: The true story of a man who forged documents to claim ownership of the Arizona territory in the late 19th century.

filmography.title: Champagne for Caesar
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, neurotic soap tycoon who tries to stop a genius contestant from bankrupting his company on a quiz show.
filmography.plot: An unemployed genius goes on a radio quiz show to bankrupt the sponsor who refused him a job.

filmography.title: His Kind of Woman
filmography.role_description: A hammy, swashbuckling movie star who gets a chance to be a real-life hero during a shootout at a Mexican resort.
filmography.plot: A deported gangster plans to re-enter the USA by assuming the identity of a gambler.

filmography.title: House of Wax
filmography.role_description: A sculptor disfigured in a fire who rebuilds his wax museum by murdering people and coating them in wax.
filmography.plot: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

filmography.title: The Ten Commandments
filmography.role_description: The cruel Egyptian master builder who enslaves the Hebrews and is killed by Moses.
filmography.plot: Moses discovers his Hebrew heritage and leads his people out of Egypt, facing the wrath of Pharaoh Rameses.

filmography.title: While the City Sleeps
filmography.role_description: A spoiled media heir who pits his newspaper's editors against each other to catch a serial killer.
filmography.plot: Reporters at a newspaper compete to catch a serial killer, using their women as bait to get the scoop.

filmography.title: The Fly
filmography.role_description: The brother of a scientist who helps his sister-in-law after a teleportation experiment goes horribly wrong.
filmography.plot: A scientist's experiments with a matter transporter go awry when a housefly enters the machine with him.

filmography.title: House on Haunted Hill
filmography.role_description: An eccentric millionaire who invites five strangers to a haunted house party, offering $10,000 to anyone who survives the night.
filmography.plot: A millionaire offers ten thousand dollars to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spook house overnight with him and his wife.

filmography.title: The Tingler
filmography.role_description: A pathologist who discovers a parasite that grows on the spinal cords of people who are frightened.
filmography.plot: A pathologist discovers a parasite that feeds on fear and can only be killed by screaming.

filmography.title: House of Usher
filmography.role_description: A hypersensitive nobleman who believes his family bloodline is cursed with madness and evil.
filmography.plot: A man visits his fiancée's family estate and finds her brother obsessed with the belief that their family is cursed.

filmography.title: The Pit and the Pendulum
filmography.role_description: A Spanish nobleman tormented by the memory of his torturer father and the belief that he buried his wife alive.
filmography.plot: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the circumstances of his sister's death after she married the son of a cruel Inquisitor.

filmography.title: Tales of Terror
filmography.role_description: Three distinct roles in this anthology: a grieving widower, a pompous wine taster, and a man hypnotized at the moment of death.
filmography.plot: Three stories adapted from Edgar Allan Poe: a grieving widower, a vengeful husband, and a man mesmerized at the moment of death.

filmography.title: The Raven
filmography.role_description: A gentle sorcerer who engages in a magical duel with a rival wizard in this horror-comedy.
filmography.plot: A magician who has been turned into a raven turns to a former sorcerer for help in this comedic adaptation of Poe's poem.

filmography.title: The Haunted Palace
filmography.role_description: A man possessed by the spirit of his warlock ancestor who seeks revenge on the town that burned him.
filmography.plot: A man arrives in a New England town to claim his family castle, only to find it inhabited by mutants and the spirit of his warlock ancestor.

filmography.title: The Comedy of Terrors
filmography.role_description: An unscrupulous undertaker who murders people to drum up business for his funeral home.
filmography.plot: An undertaker who hasn't had any customers lately decides to go out and create some by killing people.

filmography.title: The Last Man on Earth
filmography.role_description: The sole survivor of a global plague who hunts the vampire-like infected by day and barricades himself by night.
filmography.plot: When a disease turns all of humanity into living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

filmography.title: The Masque of the Red Death
filmography.role_description: A satan-worshipping prince who mocks death by hosting a lavish masquerade ball while a plague ravages the land.
filmography.plot: A European prince terrorizes the local peasantry while using his castle as a refuge against the 'Red Death' plague that stalks the land.

filmography.title: The Tomb of Ligeia
filmography.role_description: A widower who marries a new wife but remains obsessed with and haunted by the spirit of his deceased first wife.
filmography.plot: A man's obsession with his dead wife drives a wedge between him and his new bride.

filmography.title: Witchfinder General
filmography.role_description: A chillingly calm and ruthless witch-hunter who exploits the chaos of the English Civil War for profit and sadism.
filmography.plot: A young soldier seeks to stop a witch hunter who terrorizes the English countryside.

filmography.title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
filmography.role_description: A disfigured genius who exacts elaborate, biblical-themed revenge on the doctors he blames for his wife's death.
filmography.plot: A doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for his wife's death.

filmography.title: Theatre of Blood
filmography.role_description: A Shakespearean actor who murders the critics who denied him an award, using methods inspired by the Bard's plays.
filmography.plot: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

filmography.title: The Great Mouse Detective
filmography.role_description: The voice of the criminal mastermind rat who plots to overthrow the Queen of Mice; a role Price cherished.
filmography.plot: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

filmography.title: The Whales of August
filmography.role_description: A courtly Russian émigré who befriends two elderly sisters in Maine; one of his most poignant dramatic roles.
filmography.plot: Two elderly sisters deal with the death of their husbands and the realities of aging while vacationing in Maine.

filmography.title: Edward Scissorhands
filmography.role_description: The gentle, eccentric creator of Edward who dies before he can finish his creation; Price's final feature film role.
filmography.plot: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.
